name: Retailo Group Holding Limited
description: Developer of an online marketplace platform designed to address issues within the informal retail market. The company's platform provides access to a list of suppliers and products to order along with delivery services, enabling retailers, manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers to save money and improve their working capital requirements and inventory management.
one_liner: Developer of an online marketplace platform designed to address issues within the informal retail market. The company's platform provides access to a list of suppliers and products to order along with delivery services, enabling retailers, manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers to save money and improve their working capital requirements and inventory management.

name: Rosetta.Ai Holding Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a customer retention platform designed to facilitate e-commerce companies in improving conversion and customer loyalty. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence technology to enhance customer conversion and retention by analyzing consumer preferences, and predicting inventory, and recommending products for online and offline during shopping flow, enabling e-commerce businesses to increase conversion and order value.
one_liner: Developer of a customer retention platform designed to facilitate e-commerce companies in improving conversion and customer loyalty. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence technology to enhance customer conversion and retention by analyzing consumer preferences, and predicting inventory, and recommending products for online and offline during shopping flow, enabling e-commerce businesses to increase conversion and order value.
industry: Ecommerce, SaaS, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

name: Shopeando SAPI de CV
description: Provider of logistics services intended to simplify buying products directly from big Chinese e-commerce websites. The company's services offer delivery services of personal and business import products directly to the customer's doorsteps, enabling customers to get their desired products at the right time and place.
one_liner: Provider of logistics services intended to simplify buying products directly from big Chinese e-commerce websites. The company's services offer delivery services of personal and business import products directly to the customer's doorsteps, enabling customers to get their desired products at the right time and place.

name: 72Lux Inc.
description: Developer of a distributed shopping platform intended to reduce the marketing budget. The company's platform revolutionizes affiliate marketing, integrates shopping experiences into paid search, display and social media and turnkey embeddable commerce options are available for websites, allows maximum flexibility on desktop and mobile, and holds multiple patents for universal checkout, enabling advertisers, retailers and publishers to create shoppable sites, content, advertisements, mobile applications and other commerce experiences.
one_liner: Developer of a distributed shopping platform intended to reduce the marketing budget. The company's platform revolutionizes affiliate marketing, integrates shopping experiences into paid search, display and social media and turnkey embeddable commerce options are available for websites, allows maximum flexibility on desktop and mobile, and holds multiple patents for universal checkout, enabling advertisers, retailers and publishers to create shoppable sites, content, advertisements, mobile applications and other commerce experiences.

name: SimpleHoney Inc.
description: Provider of a mobile application for creating create lists needed by users. The company offers its users with an application to make their wish list of the places and things they wish for and provide shopping packages accordingly.
one_liner: Provider of a mobile application for creating create lists needed by users. The company offers its users with an application to make their wish list of the places and things they wish for and provide shopping packages accordingly.

name: Skinseoul Lab
description: Operator of a tech-driven e-commerce startup addressing global skincare market challenges through advanced AI and data-driven solutions while collecting and matching public information such as product trends, pricing, ingredient insights, and consumer reviews across multiple platforms to enhance its offerings.
one_liner: Operator of a tech-driven e-commerce startup addressing global skincare market challenges through advanced AI and data-driven solutions while collecting and matching public information such as product trends, pricing, ingredient insights, and consumer reviews across multiple platforms to enhance its offerings.

name: Splendid Labs, Inc
description: Developer of a mobile application designed to track and shop products. The company's mobile application automatically identifies and recognizes the products saved as screenshots in mobiles camera roll, enabling users to move those products into lists, keep track of sales and other deals and then finally buy when the price is right.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application designed to track and shop products. The company's mobile application automatically identifies and recognizes the products saved as screenshots in mobiles camera roll, enabling users to move those products into lists, keep track of sales and other deals and then finally buy when the price is right.

name: Squares App, Inc.
description: Squares transforms the process of event hosting and workspace flexibility with a platform that gives you access to 2000+ locations where you can work, meet and create.
one_liner: Squares transforms the process of event hosting and workspace flexibility with a platform that gives you access to 2000+ locations where you can work, meet and create.

name: Stylemyle Inc.
description: Operator of an online marketplace intended for contemporary luxury fashion to sell dynamically-priced overstock collections. The company's platform offers apparel like dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, workwear, and accessories like shoes, bags, belts, hats, gloves, and jewelry, enabling luxury boutiques and designers to turn unsold inventory into sales.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace intended for contemporary luxury fashion to sell dynamically-priced overstock collections. The company's platform offers apparel like dresses, jackets, bottoms, tops, workwear, and accessories like shoes, bags, belts, hats, gloves, and jewelry, enabling luxury boutiques and designers to turn unsold inventory into sales.

name: El-Dokan, Inc.
description: Operator of an information technology consulting company intended to develop enterprise e-commerce software designed for large and growing retail stores. The company's expertise involves end-to-end software development and web application development for e-commerce businesses, enabling clients to focus more on their core businesses.
one_liner: Operator of an information technology consulting company intended to develop enterprise e-commerce software designed for large and growing retail stores. The company's expertise involves end-to-end software development and web application development for e-commerce businesses, enabling clients to focus more on their core businesses.

name: Trocafone, Inc.
description: Operator of an online smartphone marketplace intended to help customers to buy and sell used phones and smartphones online. The company's marketplace improves the selling and buying experience by acquiring the devices from sellers, refurbishing and re-selling them as pre-owned certified, enabling buyers to enjoy various deals for peer-to-peer transactions combined with the service, convenience and safety of a retail store.
one_liner: Operator of an online smartphone marketplace intended to help customers to buy and sell used phones and smartphones online. The company's marketplace improves the selling and buying experience by acquiring the devices from sellers, refurbishing and re-selling them as pre-owned certified, enabling buyers to enjoy various deals for peer-to-peer transactions combined with the service, convenience and safety of a retail store.

name: MMA Brand Services Pte. Ltd.
description: Provider of strategic branding services intended to accelerate e-commerce growth. The company uses significant growth capital to transform e-commerce brands by buying category-winning brands with a strong track record, high product quality, and great customer reviews, enabling businesses to grow into global, well-loved, and enduring household names.
one_liner: Provider of strategic branding services intended to accelerate e-commerce growth. The company uses significant growth capital to transform e-commerce brands by buying category-winning brands with a strong track record, high product quality, and great customer reviews, enabling businesses to grow into global, well-loved, and enduring household names.

name: Uniko, Inc
description: Operator of an online gift registry platform intended to assist couples to receive wedding gifts. The company's platform provides engaged couples tools to manage their registries and gives them the ability to ask for and receive cash in the lieu of household gifts, enabling couples to exchange gifts for cash or even receive customized gifts on the day of their wedding.
one_liner: Operator of an online gift registry platform intended to assist couples to receive wedding gifts. The company's platform provides engaged couples tools to manage their registries and gives them the ability to ask for and receive cash in the lieu of household gifts, enabling couples to exchange gifts for cash or even receive customized gifts on the day of their wedding.

name: Wuilt, Inc.
description: Operator of a website-building portal intended to help users create professional websites. The company gives them more control over their brand and customer experience and allows brands to create their own custom online store without having to worry about the technical aspects of running an e-commerce business, enabling users to take the hassle out of web design and build their own websites.
one_liner: Operator of a website-building portal intended to help users create professional websites. The company gives them more control over their brand and customer experience and allows brands to create their own custom online store without having to worry about the technical aspects of running an e-commerce business, enabling users to take the hassle out of web design and build their own websites.

name: Zappli, Inc.
description: Provider of a mobile-centric shopping features for consumer. The company enables consumers to create a universal account and buy from dozens of retailers in every single click.
one_liner: Provider of a mobile-centric shopping features for consumer. The company enables consumers to create a universal account and buy from dozens of retailers in every single click.
